lexUnit.name: kneel down.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: fall or come to rest on one's knees

sentence.text: Christina kneeled down to pick up the handle of a cup .
He then knelt down , took out his small , sharp penknife and cut into the fleshy area between Adam 's toes .
The girl knelt down and began to play a game of marbles with the Doctor .
Tamsin slips across to her , kneels down , and kisses Suzie on the cheek .
Maud knelt down in the dust .
As he knelt down by the fire with a hare leg to gnaw , Farquhar Neas studied her again .
She wanted to kneel down next to her friend but felt that she would be trying to get close to the untouchable .
She knelt down by Adam .
Léonie and Thérèse knelt down on the parquet floor .
He knelt down in front of her stereo system .
She saw him flex his ankle and wince , and she stood up and went over to him , kneeling down on the end of one of the sleeping-bags .
I wept a little as I climbed the creaky stairs , and when I got into the attic I knelt down beside the bed , put my hands together and prayed .
He knelt down by a familiar mound and after a moment 's hesitation yanked out the cross that he had placed at the head of the grave .
Kragan knelt down in front of Adam and looked at him as a butcher would appraise a cut of meat .
Rourke knelt down beside her and said softly , ` Forget about the police .
Her mother knelt down at the fireplace and lifted the iron grill from the front of the fireplace .
He knelt down beside her chair .
Sendei knelt down beside her as she fiddled about inside the hatch .
He knelt down by her , then went and looked at his child .
Philip knelt down beside him .
Lily knelt down on the pavement beside her husband again .
Kneeling down on the floor , he picked up an empty cartridge case .
The man , it was the bald one with the glasses , knelt down on both knees and grabbed the bottom and began to kiss it ardently .
She knelt down on the cushion , placed her ungloved hands together , closed her eyes and appeared to be either thinking or sleeping in an upright kneeling position .
Willie knelt down on the newspapers and began to dry him .
Some of them started to run towards the airport building , and a few knelt down on the wet tarmac .
Léonie and Thérèse knelt down on the parquet floor .
Instead of bending over her , he knelt down and looked at her face through the bars .
The faithful knelt down and placed their heads on the ground : La Allah illah Allah , Muhammad Resul-allah !
It is only if you kneel down and call him to you that will he come slowly for his apology .
He knelt down and held it in front of Sung 's face a moment .
The girl knelt down and began to play a game of marbles with the Doctor .
He had a plastic bag in his pocket and he knelt down in the grass and scooped it up .
Christina kneeled down to pick up the handle of a cup .
She knelt down by Adam .
She made Maggie kneel down and lean her head over the bathtub , just as she had when Maggie had to have her hair washed as a little child .
She knelt down to look .
Hitching up the skirt of her suit , Fran knelt down to retrieve them , then felt a shaft of fear run through her when she heard footsteps coming up behind her .
He knelt down and held her hand .
He knelt down to resume his weeding .
Several miles away in Queen Margaret Drive , a BBC technician knelt down beside a music stand and gently pulled a strip of card aside revealing some names and numbers .
Peter knelt down and held the glass to Sebastian 's mouth .
She knelt down and took his hands .
He knelt down and re-piled them .
Two minutes later the noise ceased and Jack knelt down again .
` It would serve you right if you had broken the damn ankle , " Travis declared with suppressed violence as he knelt down .
He decided to listen to their conversation , and knelt down outside the tent , making a little hole with his knife in the heavy cotton so that he could see the two people inside .
